content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <application xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"   xsi:schemaLocation="http://wadl.dev.java.net/2009/02 wadl.xsd"   xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"   xmlns="http://wadl.dev.java.net/2009/02">    <resources base="http://www.marine-geo.org/">      <resource path="services/GridServer">        <method name="GET" id="getGMRTGrid">          <request>              <param name="minlongitude" type="xsd:double" style="query" required="true">                 <doc>The westernmost longitude</doc>             </param>              <param name="maxlongitude" type="xsd:double" style="query" required="true">                 <doc>The easternmost longitude</doc>             </param>              <param name="minlatitude" type="xsd:double" style="query" required="true">                 <doc>The southernmost latitude</doc>             </param>              <param name="maxlatitude" type="xsd:double" style="query" required="true">                 <doc>The northernmost latitude</doc>             </param>             <param name="format" style="query" type="xsd:string" default="netcdf">                  <doc>The file format of the returned file. (Supported formats are netcdf, coards, esriascii, and geotiff)</doc>                 <option value="netcdf"/>                  <option value="coards"/>                  <option value="esriascii"/>                  <option value="geotiff"/>              </param>             <param name="mformat" style="query" type="xsd:string" default="xml">                 <doc>The file format of error responses. (Supported formats are json, xml, text, and html)</doc>                 <option value="json"/>                 <option value="xml"/>                 <option value="text"/>                 <option value="html"/>             </param>             <param name="resolution" style="query" type="xsd:string" default="default">                  <doc>Resolution Keyword (low/default (<1000 x 1000), med (<2000 x 2000), high (<4000 x 4000), max (max below 2GB))</doc>                 <option value="low"/>                  <option value="med"/>                  <option value="high"/>                  <option value="max"/>                  <option value="default"/>              </param>             <param name="mresolution" type="xsd:double" style="query">                 <doc>Nearest desired resolution in meters per pixel.</doc>             </param>             <param name="layer" style="query" type="xsd:string" default="topo">                 <doc>topo - Gridded data with GEBCO 08 filled in; topo-mask - Gridded data with NaN elsewhere</doc>                  <option value="topo"/>                  <option value="topo-mask"/>                  <option value="metadata"/>              </param>         </request>          <response status="200">             <doc>No problems encountered.</doc>             <representation mediaType="application/octet-stream" />         </response>          <response status="404">              <doc>An error has occurred. Check response text</doc>             <representation mediaType="text/xml" />              <representation mediaType="text/json" />              <representation mediaType="text/plain" />          </response>         <response status="204">              <doc>No data in specified bounds</doc>             <representation mediaType="text/xml" />              <representation mediaType="text/json" />              <representation mediaType="text/plain" />          </response>         <response status="413">              <doc>Request too large</doc>             <representation mediaType="text/xml" />              <representation mediaType="text/json" />              <representation mediaType="text/plain" />          </response>       </method>      </resource>      <resource path="services/GridServer/metadata">        <method name="GET" id="getGMRTGridMetadata">          <request>              <param name="minlongitude" type="xsd:double" style="query" required="true">                 <doc>The westernmost longitude</doc>             </param>              <param name="maxlongitude" type="xsd:double" style="query" required="true">                 <doc>The easternmost longitude</doc>             </param>              <param name="minlatitude" type="xsd:double" style="query" required="true">                 <doc>The southernmost latitude</doc>             </param>              <param name="maxlatitude" type="xsd:double" style="query" required="true">                 <doc>The northernmost latitude</doc>             </param>             <param name="format" style="query" type="xsd:string" default="netcdf">                  <doc>The file format metadata is requested for. (Supported formats are netcdf, esriascii, and geotiff)</doc>                 <option value="netcdf"/>                  <option value="coards"/>                  <option value="esriascii"/>                  <option value="geotiff"/>              </param>             <param name="mformat" style="query" type="xsd:string" default="xml">                 <doc>The file format of metadata requests and errors. (Supported formats are json, xml, text, and html)</doc>                 <option value="json"/>                 <option value="xml"/>                 <option value="text"/>                 <option value="html"/>             </param>             <param name="resolution" style="query" type="xsd:string" default="default">                  <doc>Resolution Keyword (low/default (<1000 x 1000), med (<2000 x 2000), high (<4000 x 4000), max (max below 2GB))</doc>                 <option value="low"/>                  <option value="med"/>                  <option value="high"/>                  <option value="max"/>                  <option value="default"/>              </param>             <param name="mresolution" type="xsd:double" style="query">                 <doc>Nearest desired resolution in meters per pixel.</doc>             </param>             <param name="layer" style="query" type="xsd:string" default="topo">                 <doc>topo - Gridded data with GEBCO 08 filled in; topo-mask - Gridded data with NaN elsewhere</doc>                  <option value="topo"/>                  <option value="topo-mask"/>                  <option value="metadata"/>              </param>           ],         </request>          <response status="200">             <doc>No problems encountered. Metadata is returned</doc>             <representation mediaType="text/xml" />             <representation mediaType="application/json" />             <representation mediaType="text/plain" />             <representation mediaType="text/html" />         </response>          <response status="404">              <doc>An error has occurred. Check response text</doc>             <representation mediaType="text/xml" />              <representation mediaType="text/json" />              <representation mediaType="text/plain" />          </response>         <response status="204">              <doc>No data in specified bounds</doc>             <representation mediaType="text/xml" />              <representation mediaType="text/json" />              <representation mediaType="text/plain" />          </response>         <response status="413">              <doc>Request too large</doc>             <representation mediaType="text/xml" />              <representation mediaType="text/json" />              <representation mediaType="text/plain" />          </response>       </method>      </resource>    </resources>  </application>
